spring.subject: Dear @^
spring.body: Spring has ended, but taxes never take a break! During Spring, you contributed {gold}g during winter. Excellent work! As a token of our appreciation, here's a small gift to help you enjoy the Summer. ^^ -The IRS

summer.subject: Mr/Ms. @,^
summer.body: Summer is behind us, but your contributions keep us moving forward! You paid {gold}g in Summer—thank you for your commitment. Please accept this little gift as our way of saying thanks. ^^ -Your 'Friend'

fall.body: Fall is over, and the seasons turn—but taxes will keep rising. You've contributed {gold}g this Fall. Well done! Here's a gift to help you through the Winter.. ^^ -IT

winter.subject: Dear @^
winter.body: Winter is over, and so is the year! You paid us {gold}g in total this year—thank you for your dedication. However, we discovered a small error in calculating your taxes. Taking responsibility for our mistake, we’ve issued you a refund, it will be delivered tomorrow. As an apology, we’ve also included a little something extra to help you start the new year on a bright note. ^^ -Tax Collector
